message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  $120 is a bit higher than I was hoping for.  I'm willing to pay $90 for it.
Thanks for your offer, Bob! I understand that $120 might be a bit steep, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $105.
Alice, $105 is still a bit more than I'm comfortable with. Let's split the difference and I'll take it for $100.
